p: Hierarchical cluster analysis (HCA) was used to evaluate intra- and interpopulation variability and differentiation of EO constituents of S. kitaibelii, T. serpyllum, O. vulgare ssp. vulgare, A. millefolium and A. clypeolata in samples collected in different locations and/or taken from literature reports. Data was analyzed using StatSoft Statistica 12.
